content:
The statements in the AddHandler accessor of an event definition must not reference the event directly.

The recommended approach is to store the list of the event's handlers as a private field in the class, structure, or module that defined the event. For more information, see How to: Declare Custom Events To Avoid Blocking and How to: Declare Custom Events To Conserve Memory.

Error ID: BC41998

To correct this error

  • Rewrite the event definition to avoid recursion.

See Also

AddHandler - delete
Event Statement
How to: Declare Custom Events To Avoid Blocking
How to: Declare Custom Events To Conserve Memory
